answers.text: Until the day before yesterday, Alice always had eaten jam.
Alice will eat jam every other day.
Before a finite number of days ago, Alice had never eaten jam.
At some time in the future, Alice will eat jam two or more days in a row.
answers.symbolism: eventually l J and tomorrow J r

answers.text: Alice has never eaten jam two (or more) days in a row.
answers.symbolism: all_pasts l J if yesterday not J r

answers.text: Alice will eat jam at most once.
answers.symbolism: forevermore l J if tomorrow  forevermore not J r

answers.text: There has never been two or more days in a row in which Alice did not eat jam.
answers.symbolism: all_pasts l J or yesterday J r

answers.text: Alice will never eat jam after today.
answers.symbolism: forevermore l l J if tomorrow not J r and l not J if tomorrow J r r
